alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Jefferson; Lonoke; Monroe; Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 6:18PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Prairie, southeastern Lonoke, west central Monroe, north central Jefferson and northwestern Arkansas Counties through 700 PM CST... At 617 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Humnoke, or 13 miles west of Stuttgart, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stuttgart... Clarendon... Hazen... De Valls Bluff... Humphrey... Fredonia... Humnoke... Ulm... Roe... Peppers Landing... Brummitt... Parkers Corner... Stuttgart Municipal Airport... Hallsville... Allport... Coy... Aberdeen... Slovak... Tomberlin... Seaton... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for central, eastern and southeastern Arkansas.
